lines: 1. E ndaloni maler mar RuothChunywa oyudo mor,Kwaweyo paro gik mag piny,Kwaparo wach Nyasaye.
2. En kinde maber mar lemo,Owenwa richowa;Wating`o dwondwa kwawacho,"Wuonwa manie polo."
3. Wamor kwawinjo weche kuwemoanwa ka Nyasaye,Wamedo padore kuome,Kwachiko yor polo.
4. Ka golo richo e chunywa,Otamowa nyalo,Nyasaye ong`eyo dwarowa,En to okonyowa.
